details: Vulnerability in the Oracle Life Sciences InForm product of Oracle Health Sciences Applications (component: Web Server).   The supported version that is affected is 7.0.1.0. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Life Sciences InForm.  Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in  unauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle Life Sciences InForm accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.3 (Confidentiality impacts).  CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).
